channel.title: Life on Sohan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Sohan's Blog

item.description: My 2021 resolution was to be more mindful. But I made the rookie mistake of having a goal without metrics and a clear strategy. So, I can’t tell if I was indeed more mindful or not. In this post, I’m sharing some highlights from my 2021, in a random order. I personally find it fascinating to look at these at a later time. Family. Thanks to work from home for the entire year, we spent a lot of time together as a family.
